content: After handing me two pieces and then two more, my opponent took three pieces of mine and made a king, winning the game.
translations: ita:Dopo avermi passato due pezzi e poi altri due, il mio avversario mi ha preso tre pezzi e ha fatto una dama, vincendo la
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
